page.title: 10ARMED FORCES 2
page.content: Jason Robert Usher & Robert Burgess telephoned Group Captain Tootal to ask him some questions about R.A.F Hullavington.He said that there were three barrage balloons filled with hydrogen gas in operation.There were 16 hangars on The Camp which were in use for different purposes. Most of them did not contain aircraft. The camp has also got 46 tanks for use by the R.A.F.Regt. Since the Falklands War of 1982 the camp has not changed a great deal.The camp trains an average of 1200 men from the Balloon Office per year .The area of the camp is 650 acres.During July 1985 a Squadron of Harriers from R.A.F. Wittering was using the airfield.
